00112 void ScECALMappingProcessor::conditionsChanged( LCCollection * col )
00113 {
00114   std::string colName = col->getParameters().getStringVal("CollectionName") ;
00115 
00116   if (colName == _ScECALMappingColName)  {
00117       _ScECALMappingCol = col;
00118       _MappingChanged = true;
00119   }
00120 
00121 };

00136     //

00139     //}

00143     //}
00144     //if(_colNameStageCollection != "StageCollectionNotDefined") {

00146     //    message << " " << _colNameStageCollection;

00148     //  }
00149     //}  
00150     //}
00151     //catch (ErrorMissingConditionsDataHandler &conddata_error) {

00153     //  //   ... and build a combined error message.
00154     //  std::string a(conddata_error.what());
00155     //  error = true;
00156     //  if (a.size()>0) {

00159     //  }

00165     // }
00166     //_mapping.init();

00168     printParameters();
00169 
00170     _MappingChanged = false;
00171 
00172   bool error = false;
00173 
00174 //110906.coterra
00175   if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _ScECALMappingColName))  {
00176       message << " undefined conditions: " << _ScECALMappingColName << std::endl;
00177       error = true;
00178   }
00179 
00180 
00181 #if fromLocalFile
00182     // Read mapping file
00183     // For now just read from a text data
00184 
00185     for (int slot=0;slot<ScECAL_NSLOT;slot++)
00186       for (int fe=0;fe<ScECAL_NFE;fe++)
00187         for (int chip=0;chip<ScECAL_NCHIP;chip++)
00188           for (int chan=0;chan<ScECAL_NCHAN;chan++)
00189             _ScECALmap[slot][fe][chip][chan] = std::pair<int,int>(0,0);
00190 
00191     
00192 
00193     ifstream file( _mappingData.c_str());
00194     if(file==0){
00195       cout<<"!!!ERROR MAPPING FILE DOES NOT EXIST!!!"<<endl;
00196     }
00197     int layer,strip,slot,fe,chip,channel,dac;
00198     double vo, dacover;
00199     int islot;
00200 
00201     for(int ii=0;ii<2160;ii++){
00202       file>>layer>>strip>>slot>>fe>>chip>>channel>>dac>>vo>>dacover;
00203       islot = slot == 5 ? 0 : 1;
00204       _ScECALmap[islot][fe][chip][channel].first=layer;
00205       _ScECALmap[islot][fe][chip][channel].second=strip;  
00206     }  
00207 
00208 #endif  // fromLocalFile
00209 
00210   } // init

00217 void ScECALMappingProcessor::processEvent(LCEvent* evt) {
00218 
00219   int nEvent = evt->getEventNumber();
00220 
00221   if (_MappingChanged ) {
00222     if ( !_ScECALMappingCol ) {
00223         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update Mapping, ScECAL Mapping collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00224         //        throw StopProcessingException(this);
00225     }
00226 
00227     for (int slot=0;slot<ScECAL_NSLOT;slot++) {
00228       for (int fe=0;fe<ScECAL_NFE;fe++) {
00229         for (int chip=0;chip<ScECAL_NCHIP;chip++) {
00230           for (int chan=0;chan<ScECAL_NCHAN;chan++) {
00231             _ScECALmap[slot][fe][chip][chan] = std::pair<int,int>(0,0);
00232           }
00233         }
00234       }
00235     }
00236 
00237     int layer,strip,slot,fe,chip,channel,dac;
00238     double vo, dacover;
00239     int islot;
00240     for (int i = 0; i < _ScECALMappingCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i) {
00241       ScECALMapping * scecalMapping = new ScECALMapping( _ScECALMappingCol->getElementAt(i) );
00242 
00243       layer = scecalMapping->getID0();
00244       strip = scecalMapping->getID1();
00245       slot  = scecalMapping->getSLOT();
00246       fe    = scecalMapping->getFE();
00247       chip  = scecalMapping->getCHIP();
00248       channel  = scecalMapping->getCHANNEL();
00249       dac  = scecalMapping->getDAC();
00250 
00251       islot = slot == 5 ? 0 : 1;
00252 
00253       _ScECALmap[islot][fe][chip][channel].first=layer;
00254       _ScECALmap[islot][fe][chip][channel].second=strip;
00255  
00256       if ( nEvent%1000 == 0 ){
00257         cout << "Mapping " << layer << "-" << strip << " slot:" << slot << " fe:" << fe 
00258              << " chip:" << chip << " channel:" << channel << " dac:" << dac 
00259              << " islot:" << islot << endl;
00260       }
00261 
00262       delete scecalMapping;
00263 
00264     }
00265 
00266     _MappingChanged = false;
00267   }
00268 
00269 
00270 
00271   try {
00272       LCCollection* inVector = evt->getCollection(_inputColName);
00273       LCCollectionVec* _outputCol = new LCCollectionVec(LCIO::CALORIMETERHIT);
00274       //EVENT::LCParameters & theParam = _outputCol->parameters();
00275 
00276     long64 timestamp = evt->getTimeStamp();
00277 
00278 
00279       //Set the cell decoder which might be useful in event displays
00280       //suggested by Allister
00281       // 0 <-> CellID0, 32 <-> CellID1
00282       //theParam.setValue(LCIO::CellIDEncoding,HcalCellIndex::getEncodingString(0) + "," + HcalTileIndex::getEncodingString(32));
00283       // write 3d coordinates
00284     LCFlagImpl hitFlag(_outputCol->getFlag());
00285     hitFlag.setBit(LCIO::RCHBIT_LONG);
00286       // CellID1 is only stored if the flag word (bit CHBIT_ID1) of the collection is set.
00287     hitFlag.setBit(LCIO::CHBIT_ID1);
00288     _outputCol->setFlag(hitFlag.getFlag());
00289 
00290     pair<int,int> chanID;
00291 
00292     for (int i = 0; i < inVector->getNumberOfElements(); i++) {  // i
00293       AdcBlock adc_block(inVector->getElementAt(i));
00294 
00295         // Skip if it is not the ScECAL crate (=206)
00296       if (adc_block.getCrateID()!=206) continue;
00297 
00298       for (int kadc = 0; kadc < 12; kadc++) {
00299 
00300         chanID = this->getScECALChannelID(adc_block.getSlotID(),adc_block.getBoardFrontEnd(),
00301                                             kadc,adc_block.getMultiplexPosition());
00302 
00303         CalorimeterHitImpl* aCalorimeterHit = new CalorimeterHitImpl();
00304 
00305         aCalorimeterHit->setCellID0(chanID.first);
00306         aCalorimeterHit->setCellID1(chanID.second);
00307         aCalorimeterHit->setEnergy(adc_block.getAdcVal(kadc));
00308         aCalorimeterHit->setTime(timestamp);
00309         aCalorimeterHit->setPosition(this->getChannelPosition(chanID.first,chanID.second).data());
00310         _outputCol->addElement(aCalorimeterHit);   
00311       } // adc_block
00312 
00313     } // i
00314 
00315     evt->addCollection(_outputCol, _outputColName);
00316   }  // try
00317   catch (DataNotAvailableException &e) {
00318 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00319       std::cout << "ScECALMappingProcessor::processEvent(): data not available exception" << std::endl;
00320 #endif
00321 
00322   }
00323 
00324 }
